profile.summary: Very Good Ventures is a podcast channel focused on technology, particularly AI and its applications in podcasting and software development. The channel features interviews with industry professionals, promoting innovation and the future of technology.

targetAudience.gender: Mixed, likely with a male skew

uniqueFeatures.communityEngagement: Likely minimal, focused on content delivery
uniqueFeatures.episodeFormat: Interview-style, likely with a moderate length (30-60 minutes)
uniqueFeatures.guestTypes: Tech entrepreneurs, software developers, AI specialists

coreBeliefs: The potential of AI to improve workflows
The importance of fast and efficient software development
The value of innovation and entrepreneurship
The power of autonomy in teams
